full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,YI DAM SANGS RGYAS BYANG SEMS MANG PO LA SO SOR SBYAR CHOG RJES GNANG BYA BA'I TSUL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(YI DAM SANGS RGYAS BYANG SEMS MANG PO LA, ,SO SOR SBYAR CHOG RJES GNANG BYA BA'I TSUL, ,LHA DBANG PHYOGS LAS RNAM RGYAL SPRUL SKU YI, ,BKA' BZHIN CHOS KYI RGYAL @006B MTSAN ZHES BYAS BKOD, ,'DI LTAR BSKRUN PA'I RNAM DKAR DGE BA'I MTHUS, ,'DI BZHIN RJES GNANG BSTZAL BA'I 'GRO KUN GYIS, ,SKU GSUM BDE BA CHEN PO THOB PA DANG, ,THUB BSTAN DAR ZHING YUN RING GNAS GYUR CIG ,CES BTZUN PA BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS CHOS GRVA CHEN PO BKRA SHIS LHUN PO'I GZIMS KHAMS RGYAL MTSAN MTHON PO'I GZIMS CHUNG YID DGA' CHOS 'DZIN DU BRIS PA DGE BAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN,
